name: Timber and Stone
description: Timber and Stone is a procedural city building game set in a medieval fantasy world. With over one-hundred resources to gather and craft, Timber and Stone has the feel of a real time strategy game, but with much more depth and complexity.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7.0 Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GPU passmark greater than 1300 ( shader model 2.0 ) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7.0 Processor: 2.5 GHz quad core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GPU Passmark greater than 2000 ( shader model 2.0 ) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
